bill.title: Healthy Families Program: Medi-Cal: program transition:
bill.description: An act to amend Section 7575 of, and to add Section 7582 to, the Government Code, to amend Sections 123865, 123870, 123875, 123940, and 123955 of the Health and Safety Code, to add Chapter 16.2 (commencing with Section 12694.1) to Part 6.2 of Division 2 of the Insurance Code, and to amend Section 14105.22 of, and to add Sections 14005.26 and 14005.27 to, the Welfare and Institutions Code, relating to health coverage, and making an appropriation therefor, to take effect immediately, bill related to the budget.

history.action: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From printer. May be acted upon on or after March 8.
Withdrawn from committee. (Ayes 24. Noes 14. Page 2916.) Ordered to second reading.
Read second time. Ordered to third reading.
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 23. Noes 10. Page 2983.) Ordered to the Assembly.
In Assembly. Read first time. Held at Desk.
From committee with author's amendments. Read second time and amended. Re-referred to Com. on BUDGET. Assembly Rule 96 suspended. (Page 5412.) Withdrawn from committee. Ordered to third reading.

votes.desc: Senate 3rd Reading SB1034 Committee on B. & F.R. (Leno)
